data.title: Mr David Lloyd George (Hansard)
data.text:
1863 - March 26, 1945

Constituencies

Caernarvon District of Boroughs April 10, 1890 - December 14, 1918

Caernarvon District of Boroughs December 14, 1918 - November 15, 1922

Caernarvon District of Boroughs November 15, 1922 - December 6, 1923

Caernarvon District of Boroughs December 6, 1923 - January 12, 1945

Offices

President of the Board of Trade 1905 - 1908

Chancellor of the Exchequer 1908 - 1915

Minister of Munitions 1915 - 1916

Secretary of State for War 1916 - 1916

Prime Minister December 6, 1916 - October 22, 1922

Father of the House of Commons 1929 - 1945

Titles in Lords

1st Earl Lloyd George of Dwyfor 1945 - March 26, 1945

Earl Lloyd-George of Dwyfor February 12, 1945 - March 26, 1945

Viscount Gwynedd February 12, 1945 - March 26, 1945

Contributions

First recorded, on April 24, 1890 THE TOWN HOLDINGS COMMITTEE. Commons

By year, 20952 in total: 1890 1891 1892 1893 1894 1895 1896 1897 1898 1899 1900 1901 1902 1903 1904 1905 1906 1907 1908 1909 1910 1911 1912 1913 1914 1915 1916 1917 1918 1919 1920 1921 1922 1925 1926 1927 1928 1929

Last recorded, on April 15, 1929 CHARGE OF INCOME TAX. Commons

Information presented on this page was prepared from the XML source files, together with information from the History of Parliament Trust, the work of Leigh Rayment and public sources. The means by which names are recognised means that errors may remain in the data presented.
